name: Bible Black Style
description:
Maleficos non patieris vivere...

Trained with screencaps from the animated adaptation. Adds an early 2000s hentai look to the image. Keep the weight between 0.6 and 0.8 for good results. Tested with anything-v3 and orangemix. It should work with other nsfw lora.

meta.prompt: 1girl, solo, school uniform, green_eyes, brown_hair, maroon bowtie, large_breasts, smile, indoors, ponytail, masterpiece, best quality, illustration, <lora:bb-style:0.6>,
meta.negativePrompt: (worst quality, low quality:1.4), text, title, logo, signature, out of frame, multiple, mangled, disfigured,
